name: Start The Game
description:
"In this unique action RPG puzzle platformer RTS adventure, you will experience wonderful breathtaking 3D-open world, full of magical creatures powered by superintelligent next generation AI, gorgeous motion captured pixel art created with ground breaking AR/VR/XR technology, and the story that will bring you joy and tears like nothing you have ever seen, ever!"

You just need to Start The Game.

Made for Meta Game Jam
